lyric:
[by:fgbox]
[00:00.030]
[00:00.800]
[00:06.840]I thought that I ve been hurt before
[00:10.680]
[00:12.490]But no one s ever left me quite this sore
[00:16.800]
[00:19.510]Your words cut deeper than a knife
[00:23.580]
[00:25.090]Now I need someone to breathe me back to life
[00:29.790]
[00:32.450]Got a feeling that I m going under
[00:35.690]But I know that I ll make it out alive
[00:38.900]If I quit calling you my lover
[00:42.080]Move on
[00:43.610]You watch me bleed until I can t breathe, shaking
[00:48.060]Falling onto my knees
[00:50.320]And now that I m without your kisses
[00:54.520]I ll be needing stitches
[00:57.740]Tripping over myself, aching
[01:00.920]Begging you to come help
[01:02.560]
[01:03.160]And now that I m without your kisses
[01:07.200]I ll be needing stitches
[01:10.180]
[01:11.030]Just like a moth drawn to a flame
[01:14.610]
[01:16.310]Oh, you lured me in I couldn t sense the pain
[01:20.900]
[01:23.710]Your bitter heart, cold to the touch
[01:27.530]
[01:28.810]Now I m gonna reap what I sow
[01:31.250]
[01:31.820]I m left seeing red on my own
[01:34.860]
[01:36.420]Got a feeing that I m going under
[01:39.700]But I know that I ll make it out alive
[01:42.940]If I quit calling you my lover
[01:46.080]Move on
[01:47.660]You watch me bleed until I can t breathe, shaking
[01:52.130]Falling onto my knees
[01:53.810]
[01:54.330]And now that I m without your kisses
[01:58.560]I ll be needing stitches
[02:01.780]Tripping over myself, aching
[02:04.940]Begging you to come help
[02:06.600]
[02:07.180]And now that I m without your kisses
[02:11.230]I ll be needing stitches
[02:14.220]
[02:21.060]Needle and the thread
[02:22.180]Gotta get you out of my head
[02:24.150]Needle and the thread
[02:25.350]Gonna wind up dead
[02:27.300]Needle and the thread
[02:28.520]Gotta get you out of my head
[02:30.530]Needle and the thread
[02:31.740]Gonna wind up dead
[02:33.740]Needle and the thread
[02:34.900]Gotta get you out of my head
[02:36.920]Needle and the thread
[02:38.140]Gonna wind up dead
[02:40.130]Needle and the thread
[02:41.300]Gotta get you out of my head, get you out of my head
[02:45.320]You watch me bleed until I can t breathe, shaking
[02:49.740]Falling onto my knees
[02:51.410]
[02:51.950]And now that I m without your kisses
[02:56.020]I ll be needing stitches
[02:59.310]Tripping over myself, aching
[03:02.580]Begging you to come help
[03:04.680]And now that I m without your kisses
[03:08.960]I ll be needing stitches

[03:17.770]Now that I m without your kisses
[03:21.560]I ll be needing stitches
tlyric:
[by:戴枫楠]
[00:06.840]念及往日也曾如此受伤
[00:12.490]但这疼痛却是无人予尝
[00:19.510]你的言语刺骨锋利非常
[00:25.090]如今谁来救我重返沧桑
[00:32.450]如溺深海我的躯壳沉降
[00:35.690]自我拯救我的生命鲜活
[00:38.900]若我从此再不唤你挚爱
[00:42.080]前行 远望
[00:43.610]看我流血窒息你却无关痛痒
[00:48.060]颤抖战栗双膝跪地遍体鳞伤
[00:50.320]终于你的吻我无法永得
[00:54.520]我想我的伤口需要缝合
[00:57.740]绊倒自己我的固守
[01:00.920]痛苦乞求你的援救
[01:03.160]终于你的吻我无法永得
[01:07.200]我想我的伤口需要缝合
[01:11.030]仿佛飞蛾扑火盲目执着
[01:16.310]是你的诱惑使我的内心迷失
[01:23.710]你艰酸苦涩的内心寒不可及
[01:28.810]如今因果得报是我咎由自取
[01:31.820]我怒火中烧却只能自怨自艾
[01:36.420]如溺深海我的躯壳沉降
[01:39.700]自我拯救我的生命鲜活
[01:42.940]若我从此再不唤你挚爱
[01:46.080]前行 远望
[01:47.660]看我流血窒息你却无关痛痒
[01:52.130]颤抖战栗双膝跪地遍体鳞伤
[01:54.330]终于你的吻我无法永得
[01:58.560]我想我的伤口需要缝合
[02:01.780]绊倒自己我的固守
[02:04.940]痛苦哀求你的援救
[02:07.180]终于你的吻我无法永得
[02:11.230]我想我的伤口需要缝合
[02:21.060]一针一线
[02:22.180]将你逐出我的记忆
[02:24.150]一针一线
[02:25.350]我的生死随风而逝
